Method Detail

translate

private java.lang.String[] translate(java.lang.String originalword,
                                     Language sourceLanguage,
                                     Language targetLanguage)
Method translate Translates the String originalword from sourceLanguage to targetLanguage. All results are returned in an Array of Strings. To be called via the wrappers (to ensure that one of the languages is UNL, because otherwise we can't translate).

translateToUNL

public java.lang.String[] translateToUNL(java.lang.String originalword,
                                         Language sourceLanguage)
Method translateToUNL Translates the String originalword from sourceLanguage to UNL. All results are returned in an Array of Strings, if no results are found an empty Array is returned.

translateFromUNL

public java.lang.String[] translateFromUNL(java.lang.String originalword,
                                           Language targetLanguage)
Method translateFromUNL Translates the String originalword from UNL to targetLanguage. All results are returned in an Array of Strings, if no results are found an empty Array is returned

translateMWToUNL

public java.lang.String[] translateMWToUNL(java.lang.String[] multiWordTerm,
                                           Language sourceLanguage)
Method translateMWToUNL Translates a String multiWordTerm from sourceLanguage to UNL. All results are returned in a set, if no results are found an empty set is returned.

findMultiWordTerms

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet findMultiWordTerms(java.lang.String[] query,
                                                                  Language sourceLanguage)
Method findMultiWordTerms To cope with multi word terms the query is first regarded as only one multi word term of length k and tried to translate. If there is no translation found all sub multi word terms of length k-1 are tried. If a match is found the translated words are removed from the query. If we arrive at one word terms, there is either a translation (or various) returned or not, in any case the processing stops.

translateListToUNL

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet translateListToUNL(java.util.LinkedList query,
                                                                  Language sourceLanguage)
Method translateListToUNL Translates a query consisting of various words from sourceLanguage to UNL. Multiword-terms are found. All results are returned in a set, if no results are found an empty set is returned.

translateFromUNL

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet translateFromUNL(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet query,
                                                                Language targetLanguage)
Method translateFromUNL Translates every term of the query from UNL to targetLanguage. All results are returned in a set. If there is more than one translation for a word, all translations will be in the set. If none of the query terms can be translated, the empty set is returned.

tokenToString

private java.lang.String tokenToString(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Token originalword)
Method tokenToString Provides an alternative to the deprecated token.term(). Returns a String with the content of the token.

addAll

private org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet addAll(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet set,
                                                       java.lang.String[] array)
Method addAll Adds all elements of the array to the CharArraySet.
